data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiSIEM - 5.1.1
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Fortinet FortiSIEM" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Incident: Get Incident Details
workflows.description: Get details of an incident from Fortinet FortiSIEM server based on the incident IDs you have specified.

arguments.alert_type_map: {"DoS": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Denial of Service")}}, "Command and Control": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Command and Control")}}, "Exfiltration": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Data Exfiltration")}}, "Lateral Movement": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Lateral Movement")}}, "Malware": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Malware")}}, "Ransomware": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Ransomware")}}, "Policy Violation": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Policy Violation")}}, "Reconnaissance": {{"AlertType"| picklist("Reconnaissance")}}}

resource.name: {{vars.item.incidentTitle or vars.item.incidentId~":"~vars.item.eventName}}
resource.description:
{{vars.item.eventName}}-{{vars.item.eventType}}

{%if vars.item.incidentSrc.srcIpAddr%}
Incident Source
{{vars.item.incidentSrc.srcIpAddr}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentTarget.destIpAddr%}
Incident Target
{{vars.item.incidentTarget.destIpAddr}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentRptIp%}
Incident Reporting IP
{{vars.item.incidentRptIp}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentSrc.srcIpAddr or vars.item.incidentRptDevName or vars.item.incidentRptIp %}
Reporting Device
{{vars.item.incidentSrc.srcIpAddr or vars.item.incidentRptDevName or vars.item.incidentRptIp}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentFirstSeen%}
First Occurred
{{arrow.get(vars.item["incidentFirstSeen"]).to("UTC").format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ")}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentLastSeen%}
Last Occurred
{{arrow.get(vars.item["incidentLastSeen"]).to("UTC").format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss ZZ")}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.phIncidentCategory%}
Incident Category
{{vars.item.phIncidentCategory | resolveRange(vars.category_map)}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.phSubIncidentCategory%}
Incident Sub-Category
{{vars.item.phSubIncidentCategory}}
{%endif%} {%if 'CVE' in vars.item.incidentComments %}
Detected CVE
{{vars.item.incidentComments|regex_search("CVE[^]]*")}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.phIncidentImpacts %}
Incident Impacts
{{vars.item.phIncidentImpacts}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentComments%}
Incident Analysts Comments
{{vars.item.incidentComments}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.attackTechnique%}
Attack Technique
{{vars.item.attackTechnique}}
{%endif%} {%if vars.item.incidentDetail%}
Incident Details
{{vars.item.incidentDetail.replace(',',' ')}}
{%endif%}

workflows.name: > FortiSIEM > Fetch
workflows.description: This playbook fetch the open incidents.

conditions.condition: {{ vars.fetch_mode == 'By Updates In Last X Minutes' }}

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title":"Fetch Mode",
    "required":true,
    "editable":true,
    "visible":true,
    "type":"select",
    "name":"fetch_mode",
    "options":[
      "By Updates In Last X Minutes",
      "By Sample Incident ID"
    ],
    "onchange":{
      "By Sample Incident ID":[
        {
          "title":"Incident ID",
          "name":"incidentId",
          "type":"text",
          "required":true,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "tooltip":"Incident ID you would like to use for mapping"
        }
      ],
      "By Updates In Last X Minutes":[
        {
          "title":"Pull Incidents Created/Updated In Last X Minutes",
          "required":true,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "type":"text",
          "name":"minutes",
          "tooltip":"Fetch incidents from last X minutes. e.g 5",
          "value":5
        },
        {
          "title":"Maximum Incidents To Pull or Size Per Page",
          "name":"incident_count",
          "type":"integer",
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "value":1000,
          "tooltip":"In FortiSIEM 6.7.6 this parameter is used as size per page and in other versions it is used as limit."
        },
        {
          "title":"Maximum Events To Pull Per Incident",
          "name":"event_count",
          "type":"integer",
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "value":5,
          "tooltip":"The Maximum number of events to be fetched per incident "
        },
        {
          "title":"Incident Status",
          "type":"multiselect",
          "name":"incidentStatus",
          "options":[
            "Active",
            "Manually Cleared",
            "System Cleared",
            "Auto Cleared"
          ],
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "value":[
            "Active"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title":"Incident Category",
          "type":"multiselect",
          "name":"incidentCategory",
          "tooltip":"Retrieve the incidents records for specified incident category",
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "options":[
            "Availability",
            "Performance",
            "Change",
            "Security",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title":"Event Type",
          "type":"text",
          "name":"eventType",
          "tooltip":"Retrieve the incidents records for specified event type",
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "placeholder":[
            "PH_RULE_SYS_USER_CREATED",
            "PH_RULE_ACCOUNT_LOCKOUT_SYSTEM"
          ]
        },
        {
          "title":"Other Filters",
          "tooltip":"Enter parameters based on which you want to filter the response. e.g. {\"status\": [0], \"eventType\": [\"PH_RULE_SERVER_CPU_WARN\"], \"incidentRptIp\": [\"10.7.12.156\"]}",
          "type":"json",
          "name":"search",
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "value":"{\"incidentRptIp\": [\"10.7.12.156\"]}"
        },
        {
          "title":"Configure Multi-Tenant Mappings",
          "name":"is_mssp",
          "type":"checkbox",
          "required":false,
          "editable":true,
          "visible":true,
          "value":false,
          "onchange":{
            "true":[
              {
                "title":"Organization Mapping",
                "name":"tenant_mapping",
                "required":true,
                "visible":true,
                "editable":true,
                "type":"json",
                "value":"{\"Super\": \"Self\",\"fortisiem_customer1\": \"fortisoar_customer1\"}",
                "tooltip":"Map the organization in FortiSIEM with the tenant in FortiSOAR. This tenant mapping will ensure that the incidents are mapped to the right tenant in FortiSOAR during ingestion."
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    "tooltip":"Allows to pull latest incidents or sample incidents for field mapping.",
    "value":"By Updates in Last X Minutes"
  }
]

arguments.fetch_mode: By Updates In Last X Minutes

arguments.last_pull_time: {%if vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'] | length > 0 %}{%if vars.request.env_setup %}{%if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == ''%}0{% else %}{{((arrow.utcnow().shift(minutes=-vars.minutes)).format('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.ssss'))}}Z{% endif %}{% else %}{{vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'][0]['value']}}{% endif %}{% else %}{%if not vars.minutes or vars.minutes == ''%}0{% else %}{{((arrow.utcnow().shift(minutes=-vars.minutes)).format('YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.ssss'))}}Z{% endif %}{% endif %}

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Set Time Configuration -> Check Fetch Mode
Check Fetch Mode -> Fetch Incident By ID 2
Check Fetch Mode -> Get Tenant IDs
Fetch Incident By ID 2 -> Save Result

workflows.description: This action allows user to update any watch list entry. The JSON object of watch list entry must contain valid watch list entry id otherwise it will be saved as a new entry to ungrouped watch list.

workflows.name: Watch List: Create Watch List
workflows.description: Creates a watch list in the FortiSIEM database. A watch list can contain one or more watch list entries

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiSIEM

params.json_object:
{
  "description": "Servers, network or storage devices",
  "displayName": "Resource Issues Test5",
  "type": "DyWatchList",
  "dataCreationType": "USER",
  "valueType": "STRING",
  "ageOut": "1d",
  "custId": 1,
  "entries": [
    {
      "inclusive": true,
      "entryValue": "PVVol_A001_A000356_5neqww",
      "ageOut": "1d",
      "triggeringRules": "Datastore Space Warning",
      "dataCreationType": "USER"
    }
  ]
}
